subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Doping (Sports)
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Riccardo Riccò, hospitalized in Italy, was ejected from the 2008 Tour de France and barred for 20 months after testing positive for a blood-booster.
snippet: Riccardo Riccò, hospitalized in Italy, was ejected from the 2008 Tour de France and barred for 20 months after testing positive for a blood-booster.
